EmailTemplate.description: HTML invitation template for The Challenge Society
EmailTemplate.name: TCS website event invite with event details
EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge Society invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME TITLE GOES HERE
{!Contact.FirstName}
Congratulations on your commitment and contribution to The Challenge this summer.
You are warmly invited to The Challenge Graduation ceremony.
We'd love to know if you are coming. Login to Challenge Society website at http://www.thechallengesociety.org to RSVP.
Where: Xxxxxxx Xxxxxxx Xxxxxx
123 Street Any Town Any City AB1 CD2
When:
XX / XX / XXXX
XX:XX - XX:XX
WWW.THE-CHALLENGE.ORG/GRADUATES
/thechallengesociety
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 75 Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7HS
